name: GameX
description: GameX is an innovative project founded by enthusiastic gamers around the world with a mission to develop exciting 3D and VR games on the blockchain including a Play 2 Earn mechanism and an in-game NFT rarity integration. In the very near future, the GameX staking portal, the P2E mechanism and GameFi are to be released into the GameX ecosystem which will yield long term sustainability for the project. Additionally, the team has set up a wallet for buybacks, provide liquidity and burn GameX tokens which will increase GMX's value in the long run. Make sure to check out our newspaper 'The GameX Daily' where you will be able to catch all the latest news on the Metaverse, gaming developments and much more! Also, don't forget to visit our medium to be kept updated on our latest developments and sneak peeks.
